**Keywords**: OpenML, Machine Learning, Online Platform, Collaboration

# Aim
*OpenML* is an online platform for collaborative machine learning. Users can 
upload, organize, search and download data sets, machine learning tasks and
algorithms. In this tutorial we want to introduce *R* users to the **OpenML**
*R* package and show how everyone can easily contribute and make use of *OpenML*.
